short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivosity is an employee recognition platform where employees can give each other small monetary bonuses for doing good work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Motivosity extension allows quick access to giving recognition from anywhere. Additionally, the extension will add recognition icons in popular applications such as Workfront, SugarCRM, Salesforce.com, and others.
